backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko actor with all CRM types including leads, customers, attendance, messaging, templates, WhatsApp config, and agent info.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains textual summaries for many frontend files describing their purpose and behavior in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with CRM and customer portal routes wrapped in ThemeProvider and ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/AgentPanelSectio: Agent management UI showing agent stats, searchable agent list, and approve/reject actions using backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/AttendanceSectio: Attendance UI handling check-in/out with camera capture, geolocation, admin reporting, and paginated attendance records.
frontend/src/components/CustomerAppLinkS: Displays and manages a sharable customer portal link with copy and open actions.
frontend/src/components/CustomerQueriesS: Admin/agent interface to view, create, and update customer queries with validation and status management.
frontend/src/components/CustomersSection: Paginated customer list with a dialog to add new customers and manage basic details.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Shows key CRM metrics including customers, leads, queries, and follow-ups with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Captures rendering errors and displays a recovery screen with reload and reset options.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpsSection: Manages scheduling, listing, and completing follow-up tasks linked to customers or leads.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with branding, theme toggle, user avatar, profile details, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LeadsSection.tsx: Displays paginated leads filtered by status, with creation, updating, and assignment actions using dialogs and forms.
frontend/src/components/MessagingSection: Provides a messaging UI to view conversations, read messages, and send new ones with conversation filtering and auto-scroll.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first-time profile setup allowing users to enter name, email, and role before saving.
frontend/src/components/TemplatesSection: Manages message templates by category with create, copy, and default-selection features for admins and agents.
frontend/src/components/TicketsSection.t: Empty component placeholder for ticket-related functionality.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppLogsSect: Shows WhatsApp follow-up message logs for admins or agents, including timestamps, lead links, and status badges.
UI for configuring WhatsApp API, selecting templates, and sending manual WhatsApp messages to customers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerAuth.ts: Manages customer phone-based auth in localStorage and provides login, logout, and profile fetch hooks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerQueries.ts: Provides hooks for submitting customer queries, retrieving query history, and fetching a confirmation message via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider with login, logout, identity persistence, and context access for authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of backend data hooks for users, customers, leads, WhatsApp config, metrics, and other entities using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles plus CSS variables defining color themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/csvUtils.ts: Generates a CSV attendance report from record data, formats fields, and triggers a file download with a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ApprovalPendingPage.t: Empty placeholder page with no content.
frontend/src/pages/CRMApp.tsx: Handles authentication and user profile loading to conditionally render login, loading states, errors, or the main dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDashboard.tsx: Displays customer profile, query submission forms, and logout options with tabbed sections for rent, sales, and interior queries.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerLoginPage.tsx: Provides customer login and registration forms with validation and integration to auth hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx: Routes users to login, dashboard, or error/loading states based on customer authentication status.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main CRM dashboard with tabbed navigation for leads, customers, queries, attendance, and admin-only sections.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and prompts authenticated users to complete their profile if missing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them for persistent state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to improving dashboard load performance.
